group.name: global
group.comment: Settings that are common to all diagnostic types.

entry.desc: This value points to the local machine's fully qualified directory path location of the OMWG diagnostics package. The ocn_diags_generator.py script will error out if this directory is not available.
Local machine directory for climatology files created by the ocn_avg_generator.py. This directory must have write permissions for the user running the postprocessing.
Local machine path to OMWG diagnostics package source mods directory.
Local machine path to OMWG diagnostics package NCL library directory.
Local machine path to OMWG diagnostics package tool library directory.
Local machine path to OMWG diagnostics package ECO library directory.
Local machine path to OMWG diagnostics working directory.
Local machine path to all OMWG diagnostics tool directories.
local machine filename containing the list of ecosystem variables to be averaged.

Output NetCDF file format - either 'netcdf4c' (netcdf4 compressed (lev=1)), 'netcdf4' (netcdf classic), 'netcdf' (netcdf3 classic), or netcdfLarge for high-resolution data sets. DEFAULT = 'netcdf'. Applies to both model and control cases.
Logical to control if working files are deleted (TRUE) or saved (FALSE) prior to generating a new set of diagnostics.

group.name: diag_types
group.comment: True of false settings to select which model diagnostic types are generated.

entry.desc: True or false to control if model vs. observations diagnostics are generated.
True or false to control if model vs. observatsions ecosystem diagnostics are generated. ** NOTE ** ecosystem diagnostics are not currently working.
True or false to control if model vs. control diagnostics are generated. If true, then all OCNDIAG_CNTRL* XML variables will need to be set correctly.

True or false to control if model vs. control ecosystem diagnostics are generated. If true, then all OCNDIAG_CNTRL* XML variables will need to be set correctly. ** NOTE ** ecosystem diagnostics are not currently working.
True or false to control if model timeseries diagnostics are generated.
True or false to control if model timeseries ecosystem diagnostics are generated. ** NOTE ** ecosystem diagnostics are not currently working.

group.name: observations
group.comment: Environment variable settings related to observations.

entry.desc: Specifies number of vertical levels used to calculate averages as follows: 62 if using tx0.1v2, 42 if using gx3v7, and 60 otherwise.

For model vs. observations, model vs. observations ecosystem, model vs. control, and model vs. control ecosystem options corresponds 7 for CCSM4.0 and greater or 6 for CCSM3. This setting determines which flux observation file to use.

For model timeseries and model timeseries ecosystem options correspond to the following CESM versions: 7b for CESM1.1 or higher, 7 for CCSM4 through CESM1.0.4, and 6 for CCSM3. This setting determines which flux observation file to use.
This value points to the local machine's fully qualified directory path location of the OMWG observational data. The ocn_diags_generator.py script will error out if this directory is not available.

This value points to the local machine's fully qualified directory path location of the OMWG timeseries observational data. This path is used as the input mean_diff_rms_obs_dir to the averager specifier class to create the regional horizontal means averages for SALT and TEMP.
This value points to the local machine's fully qualified directory path location of the BGCWG observational data. The ocn_diags_generator.py script will error out if this directory is not available.
Local machine directory to observation fluxes when CPL value is set to 6
Local machine file to observation fluxes when CPL value is set to 6
Local machine directory to observation fluxes when CPL value is set to 7
Local machine file to observation fluxes when CPL value is set to 7
Local machine directory to surface wind and wind stress fields observations
Local machine file to surface wind and wind stress fields observations
Local machine directory to sea surface height directory observations
Local machine file to sea surface height directory observations
Local machine directory to sea surface temperature observations
Local machine file to sea surface temperature observations
Local machine path to density, temperature and salinity at depth observations
Local machine file for temperature observations
Local machine file for salinity observations
Local machine file to temperature observations at 42 vertical levels
Local machine file to salinity observations at 42 vertical levels
Local machine directory to some mean observations
Local machine file to some mean observations
Local machine directory to density observations
Local machine file to density observations
Local machine path to OMWG diagnostics El Nino observations
Local machine file for OMWG diagnostics El Nino observations
Local machine directory to OMWG diagnostics PHC2 files
Local machine file for OMWG diagnostics PHC2 temperature file
Local machine file for OMWG diagnostics PHC2 salinity file

group.name: model_case_options
group.comment: Environment variable settings for model case options.

entry.desc: Model start year is used to match history time-slice or variable time-series year designations to begin accumulating averages and calculating diagnostic values. If value not set, then defaults to model run job start year as determined by the first monthly history file name.

Model end year is used to match history time-slice or variable time-series year designations to end accumulating averages and calculating diagnostic values. If value not set, then defaults to model run job end year as determined by the last monthly history file name.
Difference between model calendar and physical forcing calendar (for BGC)
Local machine filename for seasonal monthly average temperatures over years specified.
Local machine filename for model seasonal monthly averages over years specified
Local machine filename for seasonal monthly average salinity values over years specified.

This environment variable is set to null unless the plot_mod OCNDIAG_MVO_PM_MLD=TRUE (mixed layer depth plots) in which case, it is set to the same value as $CASE.pop.h.RHO.mavg_$OCNDIAG_YEAR0-$OCNDIAG_YEAR1.nc
Local machine filename for tavg file.
True or false to indicate if the model case history files are in variable time series format (TRUE) or history time slice format (FALSE)
subdir path concatenated to $DOUT_S_ROOT/ocn pointing to input history files, slice or series

group.name: model_case_options_averager
group.comment: Environment variable settings for model case option for the pyAverager tool.

entry.desc: Model case pyAverager comma separated variable list to include in climatology files. An empty string defaults to all variables.

group.name: control_case_options
group.comment: Environment variable settings for control case options.

entry.desc: Local directory path to control model DOUT_S_ROOT path for OMWG model vs. control diagnostics.
subdir path concatenated to $OCNDIAG_CNTRLCASEDIR/ocn pointing to input history files, slice or series
Control model case name used with OMWG model vs. control diagnostics
Control model resolution used with OMWG model vs. control diagnostics
Control Model start year is used to match history time-slice or variable time-series year designations to begin accumulating averages and calculating diagnostic values.
Control Model end year is used to match history time-slice or variable time-series year designations to end accumulating averages and calculating diagnostic values.
Options correspond to the following CESM versions: 7b for CESM1.1 or higher, 7 for CCSM4 through CESM1.0.4, and 6 for CCSM3. This setting determines which flux observation file to use.
Local directory path to control model climatology files for OMWG model vs. model diagnostics. This directory must have write permissions for the user running the postprocessing.
Local machine filename for control model seasonal monthly average temperature file over years specified
Local machine filename for control model seasonal monthly average over years specified
Local machine filename for control model seasonal monthly average salinity over years specified

This environment variable is set to null unless the plot_mod OCNDIAG_MVC_PM_MLD=TRUE (mixed layer depth plots) in which case, it is set to the same value as $CNTRLCASE.pop.h.RHO.mavg_($OCNDIAG_CNTRLYEAR0)-($OCNDIAG_CNTRLYEAR1).nc
True or false to indicate if the control case history files are in variable time series format (TRUE) or history time slice format (FALSE)

group.name: control_case_options_averager
group.comment: Environment variable settings for control case option for the pyAverager tool.

entry.desc: Control case pyAverager comma separated variable list to include in climatology files. An empty string defaults to all variables.

group.name: timeseries_options
group.comment: Environment variable settings for timeseries options.

entry.desc: Model start year for timeseries diagnostics. If not set, defaults to OCNDIAG_YEAR0.
Model end year for timeseries diagnostics. If not set, default to OCNDIAG_YEAR1.
y-bounds for MOC timeseries plots
y-bounds for MOC timeseries plots
basedate for timeseries
which month to skip in calculating the El Nino index timeseries??
Local machine directory for cpl log files
Local machine directory for ocn log files
Local machine directory for ocn dt files

group.name: ncl_options
group.comment: Environment variable settings related to NCL.

entry.desc: contour level options (std, gokhan, gauss)
Comma separated list of integers defining plot x and y ranges in degrees (x0,x1,y0,y1)
Comma separated list of depths in kilometers for plot averages.
Output image format supported by viewing in web browsers. Only ps will be converted to png for display on the web.
General NCL settings for all plotting routines
General NCL settings for all plotting routines
Specific NCL path for model vs. control and model vs. obs plotting routines
Specific convert command for ps to gif plot conversion
Specific NCL path for model time series plotting routines
General path for all diagnostics routines
General NCL color table settings for all plotting routines
General NCL minimum color setting for all plotting routines
General NCL maximum color setting for all plotting routines
General NCL color setting for land for all plotting routines

group.name: model_vs_obs_plots
group.comment: Environment variable settings for turning on and off model vs. observations plot modules.

entry.value: PM_SFC2D PM_FLD2D PM_FLD3DZA PM_MOC PM_WBC PM_SEAS PM_MLD PM_TSZ PM_PASSIVEZ PM_VELZ PM_VELISOPZ PM_KAPPAZ PM_UOEQ PM_VECV PM_POLARTS PM_BASINAVGTS PM_REGIONALTS
entry.desc: Model vs. observations plot order for displaying html plots on main index.html page. This is a space delimited ordered list.
Model vs. observations (surface_flux_fields) Logical to control whether to create 2D surface flux plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (surface_fields) Logical to control whether to create other 2D variable (HMXL, SSH, BSF, etc...)plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (zonal_average_3d_fields) Logical to control whether to create 3D fields zonally averaged plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (moc_fields) Logical to control whether to create MOC and Heat/Freshwater transport plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (western_boundary) Logical to control whether to create Western Boundary Current and DWBC diagnostics plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (seasonal_cycle) Logical to control whether to create seasonal cycle plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (mixed_layer_depth) Logical to control whether to create mixed layer depth plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (temp_salt_depth) Logical to control whether to create temperature and salinity on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (passive_tracers_depth) Logical to control whether to create passive traces at depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (eulerian_velocity) Logical to control whether to create Eulerian velocity (UCEL, VVEL, WVEL) on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (bolus_velocity) Logical to control whether to create Bolus velocity components on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (diffusion_depth) Logical to control whether to create diffusion coefficients on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (equatorial_upperocean) Logical to control whether to create upperocean at the equator; compared to PHC2, TOGA-TAO plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (horizontal_vector_fields) Logical to control whether to create horizontal vector/magnitude fields on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (polar_temp_salt) Logical to control whether to create polar TEMP and SALT on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (basin_averages) Logical to control whether to create depth profiles of Basin-average TEMP and SALT plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations (regional_area) Logical to control whether to create depth profiles of Regional area-average TEMP and SALT bias and stddev plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

group.name: model_vs_control_plots
group.comment: Environment variable settings for turning on and off model vs. control plot modules.

entry.value: PM_SFC2D PM_FLD2D PM_FLD3DZA PM_MOC PM_SEAS PM_MLD PM_TSZ PM_PASSIVEZ PM_VELZ PM_VELISOPZ PM_KAPPAZ PM_UOEQ PM_POLARTS
entry.desc: Model vs. control plot order for displaying html plots on main index.html page. This is a space delimited ordered list.
Model vs. control (surface_flux_fields_control) Logical to control whether to create 2D surface flux plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (surface_fields_control) Logical to control whether to create other 2D variable (HMXL, SSH, BSF, etc...) plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (zonal_average_3d_fields_control) Logical to control whether to create 3D fields zonally averaged plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (moc_fields_control) Logical to control whether to create MOC and Heat/Freshwater transport plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (seasonal_cycle_control) Logical to control whether to create seasonal cycle plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (mixed_layer_depth_control) Logical to control whether to create mixed layer depth plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (temp_salt_depth_control) Logical to control whether to create temperature and salinity on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (passive_tracers_depth_control) Logical to control whether to create passive traces at depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (eulerian_velocity_control) Logical to control whether to create Eulerian velocity (UCEL, VVEL, WVEL) on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (bolus_velocity_control) Logical to control whether to create Bolus velocity components on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (diffusion_depth_control) Logical to control whether to create diffusion coefficients on depth surfaces, contours plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (equatorial_upperocean_control) Logical to control whether to create upperocean at the equator; compared to PHC2, TOGA-TAO plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. control (polar_temp_salt) Logical to control whether to create polar TEMP and SALT on depth surfaces, contour plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

group.name: model_timeseries_plots
group.comment: Environment variable settings for turning on and off model timeseries plot modules.

entry.value: PM_CPLLOG PM_YPOPLOG PM_HORZMN PM_ENSOWVLT PM_MOCANN PM_MOCMON
entry.desc: Model timeseries plot order for displaying html plots on main index.html page. This is a space delimited ordered list.
Logical to control whether to generate CPL log energy budget line plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Logical to control whether to generate Yeager's POP log file line plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Logical to control whether to generate regional mean T,S (z,t) with diff and rms from obs (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Logical to control whether to generate ENSO wavelet plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Logical to control whether to generate annual mean max MOC time series (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Logical to control whether to generate monthly mean max MOC time series (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

group.name: model_vs_obs_ecosys_plots
group.comment: Environment variable settings for turning on and off model vs. observations ecosystem plot modules.

entry.desc: Model timeseries plot order for displaying html plots on main index.html page. This is a space delimited ordered list.
Model vs. observations ecosystem (ecosystem_maps) Logical to control whether to create 2D maps of ecosystem fields pots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Model vs. observations ecosystem Logical to control whether to create vertical cross-sections (155W and 23W) and basin zonal averages plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Logical to control whether to create seasonal cycle zonally averaged (2D or Z-int) for the ecosystem variables plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Logical to control whether to create plots of oxygen levels at beginning and end of period plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

group.name: model_vs_control_ecosys_plots
group.comment: Environment variable settings for turning on and off model vs. control ecosystem plot modules.

entry.desc: Model timeseries plot order for displaying html plots on main index.html page. This is a space delimited ordered list.
Logical to control whether to create 2D maps of ecosystem fields plots.
Model vs. observations ecosystem Logical to control whether to create vertical cross-sections (155W and 23W) and basin zonal averages plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
Logical to control whether to create seasonal cycle zonally averaged (2D or Z-int) for the ecosystem variables plots (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

group.name: model_timeseries_ecosys_plots
group.comment: Environment variable settings for turning on and off model ecosystem timeseries plot modules.

entry.desc: Model timeseries plot order for displaying html plots on main index.html page. This is a space delimited ordered list.
Logical to control whether to create time-series global ecosystem plots (dependent on PM_YPOPLOG)
Logical to control whether to create basin averaged ecosystem plots.
Logical to control whether to create time-series vertical profile ecosystem plots.
